seo.title: Digital Consulting & Web Development for SMEs | Metis Web Agency
seo.description: Digital strategy, high-converting websites & landing pages, SEO/PPC and GA4 tracking for small businesses. We turn your online presence into measurable leads. Europe-based • Remote-first.

content.title: Digital strategy & web development that turns traffic into real leads
content.subtitle: Not “just a website”. A measurable growth system.
content.body:
We start from goals and audience, translate your value into a fast, clear website or landing page, then activate visibility with SEO/Ads and clean tracking.

So your website becomes a lead channel — not a static brochure.

content.title: We put digital + advertising at the service of growing businesses
content.subtitle: A practical partner for SMEs and professionals.
content.body: If your online presence feels random, we help you bring order: goals, positioning, a website that communicates clearly, and visibility you can measure. No fluff, no vague promises—just sensible choices and a clear scope.

header.title:
One method
from strategy to measurable results
header.subtitle: A connected system, not random services.
header.body: Results come from a process: define direction, build conversion-ready pages, then drive qualified traffic and track outcomes. These are the pillars we work on.

items.title: Positioning, message & offer clarity
items.description: We define goals, audience and value proposition. We align tone of voice and communication so your website, content and campaigns speak the same language—without wasting budget.

items.title: Websites & landing pages that convert
items.description: We build fast, clear pages designed for action. Structure, copy, UX and tracking work together to turn visits into qualified enquiries.

items.title: SEO, Ads and performance tracking
items.description: We bring qualified traffic with SEO and Google/Meta Ads, then optimize using clean GA4/GTM measurement—so decisions are driven by data, not guesswork.

content.title: A clear process, built for lead generation
content.subtitle: Deliverables you can understand, results you can track.

columns.subtitle: 01 — Conversion-ready pages
columns.description: Landing pages and website sections designed to generate enquiries, with strong CTA and friction-free forms.

columns.subtitle: 02 — Tracking you can trust
columns.description: We set up GA4/GTM events and conversions so you know what is working and what is not.

columns.subtitle: 03 — Ongoing optimization
columns.description: We improve performance based on data: copy, UX, campaigns, and keywords—one iteration at a time.

header.title: Clear paths, with defined scope
header.subtitle: Pick the one that matches where you are today.
header.body: We don’t sell random tasks. We propose a complete path with a specific goal and an indicative investment—so expectations are clear and delivery stays solid.

items.title: Start with the right foundation
items.description: We define positioning and message, then build an essential website with clear copy and SEO basics.</br></br>You leave with a coherent online presence ready to grow.

items.title: You have a website but nothing has changed?
items.description: We audit what’s blocking results and fix the critical points—then we activate a lead-gen plan with measurement.

items.title: E-commerce, done with a method
items.description: We build an e-commerce designed to sell.</br></br>Then we work on acquisition and optimization to grow sales and margins over time.

content.title: Message us on WhatsApp
content.subtitle: We’ll tell you if it makes sense, timing, and next steps.
content.description:
For a fast reply, send us 3 things:

01 — your industry
02 — your goal (leads / sales / visibility)
03 — your website link (if any).

form.title: Tell us about your project
form.description: We’ll get back with a clear proposal—no unnecessary back and forth.
